name: Chikin Icons For Everything
description:
Russian designer Sergey Chikin has been drawing icons for over three years, adding new icons regularly. Icons pass through a ruthless social filter. Bullshit doesnâ€™t get into the set.


Chikin Icons For Everything is a unique handcrafted icon set for everything: heart eyes skull â€” check, alien ice cream â€” no problem, Freddy Krueger â€” you got it. First available in Figma and exclusively in our plugin.
